shortdesc.ph: Occurs when the remote video state changes.
Callback when the remote video state changes.

p.codeblock: onRemoteVideoStateChanged?( connection: RtcConnection, remoteUid: number, state: RemoteVideoState, reason: RemoteVideoStateReason, elapsed: number ): void;
onRemoteVideoStateChanged?( connection: RtcConnection, remoteUid: number, state: RemoteVideoState, reason: RemoteVideoStateReason, elapsed: number ): void;
final void Function( RtcConnection connection, int remoteUid, RemoteVideoState state, RemoteVideoStateReason reason, int elapsed)? onRemoteVideoStateChanged;
public virtual void OnRemoteVideoStateChanged(RtcConnection connection, uint remoteUid, REMOTE_VIDEO_STATE state, REMOTE_VIDEO_STATE_REASON reason, int elapsed) {}

section.note: When the number of users (in communication) or hosts (in live streaming) in the channel exceeds 32, this callback may be inaccurate.
